author: Julie Bykowicz
title: Trump on Ex-Aide Accused of Abuse: ‘We Wish Him Well’
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump said he hopes that Rob Porter, a senior White House aide who resigned this week amid domestic-abuse allegations, “will have a great career ahead of him.”
In remarks at the White House, Mr. Trump wished Mr. Porter well and noted that he had “said very strongly” that he is innocent. Several news reports this week Quote: d Mr. Porter’s two ex-wives accusing him of physical and verbal abuse. One ex-wife supplied photographs of herself with a black eye she said he had given her.
...
